Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 4 wickets for 7 runs in 3.4 overs
Post-Match Reflections: England's performance was described as a'reset' of their world-beating white-ball side
West Indies' victory was a morale boost after losing an ODI series to Ireland
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first T20I match of the England tour of West Indies 2021-22
Others: The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, on January 22, 2022
West Indies won the match by 9 wickets with 17 balls remaining
